channel.title: PvP Problem ! Problem with Zenithscape source!
channel.description: Well, i have that thing if you kill a player in wilderness other players dosent get hes loot or anything. He keeps everything after death. Dosent matter how deep in the wilderness i go. Same problem. Players keep their items after death. Sorry for my bad english.
